pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zi-O (2018, TV show)$(br2)Used as the base item and repair material for most Zi-O items$(br2)Drops different Ridewatches when right-clicked$(br2)Drops:$(li)$(l:zi_o/items/ridewatches#zi_o_ridewatch)Zi-O Ridewatch$(/l) (58.8%)$(li)$(l:zi_o/items/ridewatches#geiz_ridewatch)Geiz Ridewatch$(/l) (39.2%)$(li)$(l:zi_o/items/ridewatches#tsukuyomi_ridewatch)Tsukuyomi Ridewatch$(/l) (2%)
